author: Universal Pictures
description:
He started out as an aspiring actor, but it's behind the camera where Nick Yogendran found his calling.

On Nobody 2, he kept the production running smoothly while taking in the talent, the stunts, and the teamwork that make set life unforgettable.

Don't miss the action—Nobody 2 is in theaters now!
title: My Universal Story: Nick Yogendran | Nobody 2

author: Universal Pictures
description:
Happy Gilmore (Adam Sandler) sinks the final shot, sealing his win over Shooter McGavin (Christopher McDonald).

Buy/Rent Happy Gilmore!

Synopsis: A failed hockey player discovers an unexpected talent for golf and takes on the snob-filled pro tour. Happy Gilmore is the ultimate clash of chaos vs control, with big laughs and even bigger swings.

© Universal Pictures (1996)
Cast: Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen, Carl Weathers
Director: Dennis Dugan
Producers: Robert Simonds
Screenwriters: Tim Herlihy, Adam Sandler
